description: A spicy bean stuffing with some refreshing and creamy avocado.
name: Stuffed Sweet Potato Skins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced
2 medium avocado, peeled, de-seeded and mashed

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Wash and scrub the potatoes leaving the skin on and then slice in half lengthways.
Roast the potatoes skin side down in the oven for 1 hour. While these are cooking, you can cook the beans as per tin instructions.
Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry the garlic and onion for 3 minutes.
Add the cooked and drained beans into the pan with the spices, mix together well and continue to fry for 4 minutes.
Remove the potatoes from the oven and carefully remove 3/4 of the flesh from the inside with a fork and add the flesh to the pan with the beans and mix.
In a small bowl add avocados and lime juice and crush, mixing together to form a guacamole spread.
Now transfer your chilli mix back into the skins and cover with the cheddar cheese before serving with the guacamole on the side.
